introduction.title: Hi, Iâ€™m Michel Youssef
introduction.description: As a Full-Stack Developer with expertise in Big Data and Automation, I specialize in creating innovative solutions to streamline processes and enhance efficiency. My goal is to deliver scalable and reliable systems that make a lasting impact.

techStack.title: Tech Stack
techStack.description: Proficient in Java, Kotlin, PHP, ReactJS, and Node.js, I build robust applications across web and mobile platforms. My experience spans tools like NestJS, Airtable, Make (Integromat), and various database systems to ensure seamless integration and performance.

remoteReady.title: Remote-Ready Professional
remoteReady.description: Based in Paris, France, I am open to remote work worldwide. My flexibility in time zones and strong communication skills ensure seamless collaboration with global teams.

passion.title: Passion for Coding
passion.description: From developing administrative dashboards with ReactJS to transitioning platforms from AdonisJS to NestJS, I thrive on solving challenges through code. Programming is more than my professionâ€”itâ€™s my passion and a driving force for continuous innovation.

reviews.name: COMIN CEO
reviews.review: Michel brought exceptional value to our platform by building a scalable admin dashboard and automating driver onboarding workflows. His ability to deliver quality solutions quickly is unmatched.

reviews.name: Notabene Lead

reviews.name: Fouani Group Manager
reviews.review: Michel delivered a modern and visually stunning website for us. His attention to detail and ability to meet tight deadlines were key to the projectâ€™s success.

reviews.name: Ether Smith
reviews.review: Michel was a pleasure to work with. He understood our requirements perfectly and delivered a website that exceeded our expectations. His skills in both frontend and backend development are top-notch.

list.name: COMIN
list.description: Developed a scalable admin dashboard using ReactJS and transitioned the platform from AdonisJS to NestJS. Built secure APIs and mobile apps with React Native, enhancing user experience and operational efficiency.

list.name: Notabene

list.name: TEDMOB
